testcase.classname: Registration page should restrict password usage to a secure and high level passcode
testcase.name: There should be at least 1 lowercase char for stronger password and see the level chart change accordingly
testcase.system-out: Given User go to the GMi Bank home page.....................................passed And Click on user button....................................................passed And You should navigate to registration page................................passed And Click on Password textbox...............................................passed And Enter a password with 1 lowercase letter of at least 7 characters.......passed And Color line must be orange or green......................................passed And Click on password confirmation textbox..................................passed Then Enter to second textbox with 1 lowercase letter of at least 7 characters.passed
